title: What decade's lifestyles, trends, and social norms are better--the 50s, 60s, 70s, 80s, 90s, or now? Why do you think that way? - Quora

response.answer_text: The 50s had the real politeness factor going for them, whatever you think of various other social norms of the era. The decline in polite behavior has led to all sorts of unintended consequences, and I cannot in the slightest condone the lack of civility in current society.

I liked the 60’s because the economy was great with jobs available everywhere. You could buy dependable used cars at very low prices and the cost of gasoline was very low. The cost of housing and groceries and most things were so much lower. The wages were much lower but you could buy a lot more for your dollar spent back then. The music scene was filled with new artists bringing new songs daily. The quality of music was so much better back then. It was a great time to be alive.
